exam.question: This research has attracted wide ____ coverage and has featured on BBC television’s Tomorrow’s World.

answer.explain: 句意： 这项研究被媒体广泛地报道过， 而且BBC电视台《未来世界》节目还对此做过专题报道。message： 消息； 启示； information： 信息， 情报； data： 数据， 资料。

sentences.sContent: The scandal was widely reported in the national media .
sentences.sCn: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.sContent: The role of the news media in forming public opinion is very important.
sentences.sCn: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.sContent: The 11-day trial generated intense media interest .
sentences.sCn: 11天的审讯引起了媒体的高度关注。

sentences.sContent: A great deal of media hype surrounded the release of the group’s latest CD.
sentences.sCn: 媒体对这个组合最新唱片的发行进行了大肆炒作。

sentences.sContent: There will be another war somewhere else and the whole international media circus will move on.
sentences.sCn: 别的地方还会有战争，全球的媒体又会一窝蜂地拥过去。

sentences.sContent: ...Isn’t the mainstream media the least curious about what happened...
...The family turned to social media expressing their gratitude saying...
...But while I was learning the art of media relations...
...We discuss here the major types of media used in advertising...
...advertising agencies must select the appropriate media for the advertisement...
